Package core

Interface HlaHLAobjectRootUpdater

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    HlaDynamicalEntityUpdater, HlaExecutionConfigurationUpdater, HlaLauncherUpdater, HlaMoonUpdater, HlaPayloadUpdater, HlaPhysicalEntityUpdater, HlaPhysicalInterfaceUpdater, HlaReferenceFrameUpdater
    public interface HlaHLAobjectRootUpdater
    Updater used to update attribute values.

    This class is ThreadSafe as defined by Java Concurrency in Practice, see jcip.net.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void sendUpdate()
      Send all the attributes.
      void sendUpdate​(HlaLogicalTime logicalTime)
      Send all the attributes with a specified logical time.
      void sendUpdate​(HlaTimeStamp timestamp)
      Send all the attributes with a specified timestamp.
      void sendUpdate​(HlaTimeStamp timestamp, HlaLogicalTime logicalTime)
      Send all the attributes with a specified timestamp and logical time.

    • Method Detail

      • sendUpdate

        void sendUpdate()
         throws HlaNotConnectedException,
                HlaAttributeNotOwnedException,
                HlaUpdaterReusedException,
                HlaInternalException,
                HlaRtiException,
                HlaObjectInstanceIsRemovedException,
                HlaSaveInProgressException,
                HlaRestoreInProgressException
        Send all the attributes. Note that the Updater can not be reused after sendUpdate has been called.
        Throws:
        HlaNotConnectedException - if the federate is not connected
        HlaInternalException - on internal errors
        HlaRtiException - on exception from the RTI
        HlaAttributeNotOwnedException - if a changed attribute is not owned
        HlaUpdaterReusedException - if the Updater is reused
        HlaObjectInstanceIsRemovedException - if the object instance has been removed
        HlaSaveInProgressException - if a federation save is in progress
        HlaRestoreInProgressException - if a federation restore is in progress

      • sendUpdate

        void sendUpdate​(HlaTimeStamp timestamp)
         throws HlaNotConnectedException,
                HlaAttributeNotOwnedException,
                HlaUpdaterReusedException,
                HlaInternalException,
                HlaRtiException,
                HlaObjectInstanceIsRemovedException,
                HlaSaveInProgressException,
                HlaRestoreInProgressException
        Send all the attributes with a specified timestamp. Note that the Updater can not be reused after sendUpdate has been called.
        Parameters:
        timestamp - timestamp to send for this update
        Throws:
        HlaNotConnectedException - if the federate is not connected
        HlaInternalException - on internal errors
        HlaRtiException - on exception from the RTI
        HlaAttributeNotOwnedException - if a changed attribute is not owned
        HlaUpdaterReusedException - if the Updater is reused
        HlaObjectInstanceIsRemovedException - if the object instance has been removed
        HlaSaveInProgressException - if a federation save is in progress
        HlaRestoreInProgressException - if a federation restore is in progress

      • sendUpdate

        void sendUpdate​(HlaLogicalTime logicalTime)
         throws HlaNotConnectedException,
                HlaAttributeNotOwnedException,
                HlaInvalidLogicalTimeException,
                HlaUpdaterReusedException,
                HlaInternalException,
                HlaRtiException,
                HlaObjectInstanceIsRemovedException,
                HlaSaveInProgressException,
                HlaRestoreInProgressException
        Send all the attributes with a specified logical time. Note that the Updater can not be reused after sendUpdate has been called.
        Parameters:
        logicalTime - logical time to send for this update
        Throws:
        HlaNotConnectedException - if the federate is not connected
        HlaInternalException - on internal errors
        HlaRtiException - on exception from the RTI
        HlaInvalidLogicalTimeException - if the logical time is invalid
        HlaAttributeNotOwnedException - if a changed attribute is not owned
        HlaUpdaterReusedException - if the Updater is reused
        HlaObjectInstanceIsRemovedException - if the object instance has been removed
        HlaSaveInProgressException - if a federation save is in progress
        HlaRestoreInProgressException - if a federation restore is in progress

      • sendUpdate

        void sendUpdate​(HlaTimeStamp timestamp,
                HlaLogicalTime logicalTime)
         throws HlaNotConnectedException,
                HlaAttributeNotOwnedException,
                HlaInvalidLogicalTimeException,
                HlaUpdaterReusedException,
                HlaInternalException,
                HlaRtiException,
                HlaObjectInstanceIsRemovedException,
                HlaSaveInProgressException,
                HlaRestoreInProgressException
        Send all the attributes with a specified timestamp and logical time. Note that the Updater can not be reused after sendUpdate has been called.
        Parameters:
        timestamp - timestamp to send for this update
        logicalTime - logical time to send for this update
        Throws:
        HlaNotConnectedException - if the federate is not connected
        HlaInternalException - on internal errors
        HlaRtiException - on exception from the RTI
        HlaInvalidLogicalTimeException - if the logical time is invalid
        HlaAttributeNotOwnedException - if a changed attribute is not owned
        HlaUpdaterReusedException - if the Updater is reused
        HlaObjectInstanceIsRemovedException - if the object instance has been removed
        HlaSaveInProgressException - if a federation save is in progress
        HlaRestoreInProgressException - if a federation restore is in progress
